Parameters.Name: RECORDING-3-1-8 RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)

Test.TestName: RECORDING-3-1-8 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response: fault on CreateRecordingJobRequest (Action/MaxRecordingJobs)
Test.Description: Job Spare more than 2. The DUT send soap fault on CreateRecordingJobRequest (Action/MaxRecordingJobs)

Test.TestName: RECORDING JOB CONFIGURATION - DIFFERENT PRIORITIES (ON MEDIA PROFILE)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. No GetRecordingJobState Response
Test.Description: The DUT did not send valid GetRecordingJobStateResponse message. No response.
